title: We're Back!! Homes are Going Fast!!
posting_body: Wonderful opportunities to become a homeowner!
Call and schedule an appointment* today.
The Blanco plan has 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 baths!
A large family room and lots of closet space!
The gourmet kitchen will melt your heart ♥ with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, custom cabinets complete with an island!
Landscaped and sod with a yard that is already fenced for the family pet ♥
If responding to ad by email please include link to the posting you are inquiring about along with contact information.
*P&I. $300,900, 6.125% Fixed/7.225% APR, 3.5% Down, FHA 30 year, OAC from third party lender.
Other fees such as taxes, insurance and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.
Price and rates are subject to change without notice.
